name: alexa-skill-kiwiquake
description: Alexa Skill for New Zealand Earthquakes

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:dev:skill && npm run deploy:dev:model && npm run deploy:dev:sls
scripts.deploy:dev:model: ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.a914596c-c0b2-42ad-a61b-a7b56bdc76de -f models/en-US.json -l en-AU -p kiwiquakes && ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.a914596c-c0b2-42ad-a61b-a7b56bdc76de -f models/en-US.json -l en-US -p kiwiquakes
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prod:skill && npm run deploy:prod:model && npm run deploy:prod:sls
scripts.deploy:prod:model: ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.737654e2-bd6f-4827-9c5e-3a4a71044acf -f models/en-US.json -l en-AU -p kiwiquakes && ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.737654e2-bd6f-4827-9c5e-3a4a71044acf -f models/en-US.json -l en-US -p kiwiquakes
